abstract: Some hotels capitalize on what they used to keep hush-hush: rumors of haunting. Here's a Halloween sampler.
snippet: Some hotels capitalize on what they used to keep hush-hush: rumors of haunting. Here's a Halloween sampler.
lead_paragraph: Do you believe in ghosts? Or maybe you just have an appetite for the eerie? Some hotels capitalize on what they used to keep hush-hush: rumors of haunting. Here's a Halloween sampler:

headline.main: Hotels With Things That Go Bump in the Night
